TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProxyAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContextAttribute
Public Class ProxyAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IContextAttribute
type ProxyAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IContextAttribute

summary.span: 指示物件型別需要自訂 Proxy。

span.span: Indicates that an object type requires a custom proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前屬性套用至需要自訂 proxy 的型別。Apply the current attribute to types that need custom proxies. 您可以使用 ProxyAttribute 類別，以攔截`new`(`New`在 Visual Basic) 陳述式由衍生自 ProxyAttribute 和屬性放置所在的子系`ContextBoundObject`。You can use the ProxyAttribute class to intercept the `new` (`New` in Visual Basic) statement by deriving from the ProxyAttribute and placing the attribute on a child of `ContextBoundObject`. (將 proxy 屬性放在子系`MarshalByRefObject`不支援。)(Placing the proxy attribute on a child of `MarshalByRefObject` is not supported.) > [!NOTE] > 此類別可讓連結要求和繼承要求在類別層級。This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. A立即呼叫端或衍生的類別沒有基礎結構權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)並[繼承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CPP/customproxy_sample.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CS/customproxy_sample.cs#11)] [!code-vb[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/VB/customproxy_sample.vb#11)]

permission.span: 針對使用基礎結構程式碼執行作業。

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 建立未初始化的 或者透明 Proxy，依指定型別是否可以在目前內容中存在而定。

span.span: Creates either an uninitialized or a transparent proxy, depending on whether the specified type can exist in the current context.

returns.span: 未初始化的 或透明 Proxy。

span.span: An uninitialized or a transparent proxy.

public: virtual System::Runtime::Remoting::Proxies::RealProxy ^ CreateProxy(System::Runtime::Remoting::ObjRef ^ objRef, Type ^ serverType, System::Object ^ serverObject, System::Runtime::Remoting::Contexts::Context ^ serverContext);

param.span: 要為其建立 Proxy 之遠端物件的物件參考。

span.span: The object reference to the remote object for which to create a proxy.

param.span: 遠端物件所位在之伺服器的類型。

span.span: The type of the server where the remote object is located.

param.span: 伺服器物件所位在的內容。

summary.span: 替 所描述而位於伺服器上的遠端物件建立遠端 Proxy 的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of a remoting proxy for a remote object described by the specified , and located on the server.

returns.span: 指定之 中所描述遠端物件的遠端 Proxy 的新執行個體。

span.span: The new instance of remoting proxy for the remote object that is described in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > Proxy 建立出時，目前的方法呼叫參考標記為類別的執行個體屬性。The current method is called when a proxy is created out of a instance that references a class that is marked with the attribute. 因此，會使用此方法時，才來自傳回或呼叫，或在用戶端啟動物件的啟動過程的參數。Therefore, the method is used only when a is received from a return or parameter on a call, or during the activation of a client-activated object. 不適用於已知物件類型。The is not used for well-known object types. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CPP/customproxy_sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CS/customproxy_sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/VB/customproxy_sample.vb#2)]
